'''''Amon Hen'' 114''' is the one-hundred-and-fourteenth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in March [[1992]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''[[Gondorians|Gondorian]] Watchtower''
** By: Tom Sherry
* Editorial
** By: Nick Brown
* Contents
* Announcements
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Debi Haigh-Hutchinson
* Reviews
** By: various contributors
* Reports
** By: various contributors
* Mathom
** By: Gwyneth Morgan
* Artwork: ''[[Weathertop]]''
** By: Ian Collier
* Narn I Hin Annuminas
** By: Angela Surtees
* Our White Lady of the Birds
** By: Lyn Ritchie
* Letters
* Small Press
* Debi's Dabblings
** By: Debi Haigh-Hutchinson
* Tolk Folk
* Notices
* Where to Write (Committee)
* Additional Calligraphy and Artwork
** By: Kirsty Beck, Susanne Stopfel, Martin Roe, Rob Brown, Neil Loughran & Ruth Lacon
